languages.text: "С другой стороны, меня тревожат слухи, связанные с Кьявой Гамма. Если с Янусом уже многие годы не возникало проблем, то с {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальным миром{/g} прямо сейчас творится что-то неладное. Может быть, промедление будет стоить целой планеты".

traits.locale_text: "С другой стороны, нам никак нельзя терять связь с Кьява Гаммой. Если с системой Янус уже многие годы не возникало проблем, то с миром-заводом, по слухам с Футфола, прямо сейчас творится что-то неладное. Да еще связанное с влиянием варпа! А ведь именно на этой планете производится большинство наших кораблей и необходимой для империи техники".

languages.text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."
languages.original_text: "С другой стороны, меня тревожат слухи, связанные с Кьявой Гамма. Если с Янусом уже многие годы не возникало проблем, то с {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальным миром{/g} прямо сейчас творится что-то неладное. Может быть, промедление будет стоить целой планеты".

traits.locale_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumors concerning Kiava Gamma. There were no troubles on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the Forge World right now. Procrastination may cost us the entire planet."

"On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumors concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the forge world right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

"On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumors concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the forge world right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

"On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

languages.text: «Por otra parte, me preocupa la situación en Kiava Gamma. Janus lleva años sin dar problemas, pero algo va muy mal en el {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} ahora mismo. Cualquier retraso podría costarnos el planeta entero».
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: «Por otra parte, me preocupa la situación en Kiava Gamma. Janus lleva años sin dar problemas, pero algo va muy mal en el {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} ahora mismo. Cualquier retraso podría costarnos el planeta entero».

languages.text: “但另一方面，基亚瓦伽马星的传言也让我感到忧心忡忡。这么多年来，加努斯一直没遇到过什么问题，但我们的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}目前出了非常严重的问题。如果继续拖下去的话，我们可能会失去整颗行星。”
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: “但另一方面，基亚瓦伽马星的传言也让我感到忧心忡忡。这么多年来，加努斯一直没遇到过什么问题，但我们的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}目前出了非常严重的问题。如果继续拖下去的话，我们可能会失去整颗行星。”

languages.text: 「一方で、キアヴァ・ガンマに関する噂も気になります。ヤヌスでは何年も問題は起こっていませんでしたが、現在その{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}がとてもおかしな状況になっています。遅れが出ると、様々な惑星に被害が及ぶでしょう」
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: 「一方で、キアヴァ・ガンマに関する噂も気になります。ヤヌスでは何年も問題は起こっていませんでしたが、現在その{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}がとてもおかしな状況になっています。遅れが出ると、様々な惑星に被害が及ぶでしょう」

languages.text: "Andererseits beunruhigen mich die Gerüchte über Kiava Gamma. Und auf Janus hat es zwar viele Jahre keine Probleme gegeben, aber jetzt stimmt irgendetwas mit der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} überhaupt nicht. Jede Verzögerung könnte uns den gesamten Planeten kosten."
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: "Andererseits beunruhigen mich die Gerüchte über Kiava Gamma. Und auf Janus hat es zwar viele Jahre keine Probleme gegeben, aber jetzt stimmt irgendetwas mit der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} überhaupt nicht. Jede Verzögerung könnte uns den gesamten Planeten kosten."

languages.text: « D'un autre côté, les rumeurs qui courent au sujet de Kiava Gamma me préoccupent. Janus jouit d'une situation stable depuis plusieurs années, tandis qu'il se passe quelque chose d'anormal dans le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} en ce moment même. Si nous tardons à nous en occuper, nous pourrions perdre la planète entière. »
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: « D'un autre côté, les rumeurs qui courent au sujet de Kiava Gamma me préoccupent. Janus jouit d'une situation stable depuis plusieurs années, tandis qu'il se passe quelque chose d'anormal dans le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} en ce moment même. Si nous tardons à nous en occuper, nous pourrions perdre la planète entière. »

languages.text: "Diğer yandan Kiava Gama'yla ilgili söylentiler de beni endişelendiriyor. Janus'ta yıllardır herhangi bir sorun yaşanmadı ama {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyada{/g} şu an çok yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Orayı gitmeyi ertelemek, gezegenin tamamen kaybedilmesi anlamına gelebilir."
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, I am concerned by the rumours concerning Kiava Gamma. There have been no problems on Janus for many years, but something is very wrong with the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} right now. Delay may cost us the entire planet."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer yandan Kiava Gama'yla ilgili söylentiler de beni endişelendiriyor. Janus'ta yıllardır herhangi bir sorun yaşanmadı ama {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}endüstri dünyası{/g}nda şu an çok yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Orayı gitmeyi ertelemek, gezegenin tamamen kaybedilmesi anlamına gelebilir."
